greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=0; thereafter a(2n) = -2a(n), a(2n+1) = 2a(n) - 1.
comment: Columns of table in A104894 written in base 10.
Conjecture: the positions where 0, 1, 2, 3, ... appear are given by A048724; the positions where -1, -2, -3, ... appear are given by A065621.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
maple: f:=proc(n) option remember; if n=0 then RETURN(0); fi; if n mod 2 = 0 then RETURN(2*f(n/2)); else RETURN(-2*f((n-1)/2)-1); fi; end;
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Apr 24 2005
ext: Corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 05 2005
Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 25 2018
